events.message: The customer reported that their car was involved in a collision at the intersection around 7 PM yesterday.
The claim was categorized as an Auto Accident based on the reported keywords and incident details.
An agent was assigned to the case to guide the claimant through the next steps and document collection.
The claimant was informed that the insurance company has received their claim and is starting the review process.
Request was made for the claimant to submit police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair quotes.
The claimant submitted all requested documents, including the police report and multiple photos of the vehicle damage.
Investigation commenced to verify the details of the accident and assess the extent of the damages.
The investigation was completed successfully, confirming the claimant’s account of the vehicle collision.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the estimated repair costs and related expenses for the damaged car.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication.
The claim was officially approved, allowing the payment process to begin for the repair of the vehicle.
The insurance company issued payment to the claimant’s chosen repair shop as per the approved settlement.
After confirming the repairs were completed satisfactorily, the claim was officially closed with no further actions.
